messages.content: Gregory Nguyen works with Jose Martin.
Jose Martin is a colleague of Dennis Alvarez.
Dennis Alvarez works with Jordan Miller.
Jordan Miller is a colleague of Kimberly Price.
Kimberly Price works with Richard Stevens.
Richard Stevens is a colleague of Doris Gonzales.
Doris Gonzales works with James Johnson.
James Johnson is a colleague of Jacqueline Adams.
Jacqueline Adams works with Alexis Rivera.
Alexis Rivera is a colleague of Austin Sanchez.

queries.question: Are Gregory Nguyen and Austin Sanchez related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
